workingHours.noWorkingIntervals: There are no working hours yet

modal.title: Site details
modal.siteOwnerHelp: Select the name of the site owner.
modal.siteNameHelp: Enter the name of the site.
modal.siteUrlHelp: Enter the url of the site (like http://yoursite.url).
modal.siteWidgetAsSeparatePageUrl: Site widget as separate page url
modal.siteWidgetAsSeparatePageUrlHelp: Enter the url of the site widget as separate page.
modal.availableTestDriveFromHomeHelp: Enable or disable test drive from home
modal.maxVehicleDeliveryDistanceHelp: Enter the maximum vehicle delivery distance in miles.

notifications.adf: ADF XML Email for CRM (eLead, Momentum)

wizard.expertStepWarning: There are no active experts for step 'choose expert'!
wizard.beverageStepWarning: There are no active beverages for step 'choose beverage'!
wizard.routeStepWarning: There are no active routes for step 'choose route'!

modal.expertNameHelp: Enter the full name of the expert.
modal.expertDescriptionHelp: Type few words about the expert (is not required).
modal.linkedinUrlHelp: Enter direct link to the experts LinkedIn profile like https://www.linkedin.com/... (is not required).
modal.facebookUrlHelp: Enter direct link to the experts Facebook profile like https://www.facebook.com/... (is not required).
modal.employeeIdHelp: Enter employee identifier from your CRM (is not required).
modal.expertTitleHelp: Enter the title of the expert.
modal.expertEmailHelp: Enter the contact e-mail of the expert (is not required).
modal.expertPhoneNumberHelp: Enter the contact phone number of the expert (is not required).

modal.userNameHelp: Enter the Login name of the User.
modal.phoneNumberHelp: Enter your contact phone number (not required).
modal.sitesCountHelp: Enter maximum allowed count of sites for invited user.
modal.roleHelp: Select supposed role for invited user.

modal.stepNameHelp: Enter the name of the test drive step.
modal.stepDescriptionHelp: Type few words about the test drive step.

descriptor.ExpertStep: Is used to select expert for test drive.
descriptor.BeverageStep: Is used to select beverage for test drive.
descriptor.RouteStep: Is used to select route for test drive.
descriptor.ScheduleStep: Is used to select a booking time for test drive.
descriptor.MusicStep: Is used to select music for test drive.
descriptor.TestDriveFromHomeStep: Is used to select home location for test drive.

modal.beverageNameHelp: Enter the name of the beverage.
modal.beverageDescriptionHelp: Type few words about the beverage.

modal.routeNameHelp: Enter the name of the route.
modal.routeDescriptionHelp: Type few words about the route.

registration.messageInfo: Please, fill out the registration form.
registration.invitationCodeHelp: Enter your invitation code (from invitation e-mail).
registration.phoneNumberHelp: Enter your contact phone number (not required).
registration.confirmPasswordHelp: Repeat your password to avoid mistakes.

modal.availableSitesCountHelp: Enter maximum allowed count of sites for invited user.
modal.roleHelp: Select supposed role for invited user.

patchAvatarComponent.avatarUrlHelp: Define avatar via entering direct url to it.

patchPasswordComponent.oldPasswordHelp: We need your old password to commit changes.
patchPasswordComponent.newPasswordHelp: Enter your new password (it will be used as main password after commit).
patchPasswordComponent.newRepeatedPasswordHelp: Repeat your new password to avoid mistakes.

personalInfoComponent.emailHelp: Enter your contact e-mail (it will be used as main e-mail after commit).
personalInfoComponent.phoneNumberHelp: Enter your contact phone number (not required).

imageSelect.imageUrlHelp: Define image via entering direct url to it (like http://www.google.com/image.jpg).

sites.invalidOwnerMessage: Site owner is not valid (this field is required)!
sites.invalidWASPUrlMessage: Site widget as separated page url is not valid!
sites.invalidZipCodeMessage: Zip code is not valid (should be like 1111)!
sites.invalidMaxDeliveryDistanceMessage: Max vehicle delivery distance must be a non negative number!

registrationModel.invalidRepeatPasswordMessage: Repeated password must be equal to the password!

invitations.invalidRoleMessage: Selected supposed role for invited user is not valid (this field is required)!
invitations.invalidAvailableSitesCount: Maximum allowed count of sites is not valid (should be number higher then 0)!

experts.name: Expert's full name is not valid (this field is required)!
experts.title: Expert's title is not valid (this field is required)!
experts.description: Info about the expert is not valid!
experts.linkedInUrl: LinkedIn profile's direct link is not valid! (should be like https://www.linkedin.com/...)
experts.facebookUrl: Facebook profile's direct link is not valid! (should be like https://www.facebook.com/...)

beverages.name: Beverage's name is not valid (this field is required)!
beverages.description: Info about the beverage is not valid (this field is required)!

routes.name: Route's name is not valid (this field is required)!
routes.description: Info about the route is not valid (this field is required)!

users.invalidSitesCountMessage: Maximum allowed count of sites is not valid (should be number higher then 0)!
